title: patcher crashing
body:
every time i click the task bar icon or desktop icon it will highlight and the logo appears like normal but then disappears with the patcher never appearing for me.

Edit: i have done Change your Screen Refresh Rate and Resetting ‘winsock’ and it had no effect

replies.body:
This issue is often a result of League not being assigned the permissions it requires to interact with files outside of the League folder or other software packages it relies on. To ensure League is configured correctly, I recommend following our [permissions guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)

If that guide caused any change, please let me know.
